name: Semantic Advantage
description: Austin SEO agency specializing in organic search engine optimization, Bing and Google SEO, and social marketing. Semantic Advantage was founded in 2008, and has successful online marketing clients in the fields of ,manufacturing, e-Commerce, real estate, law and HR services. The company utilizes sophisticated software tools and mathematical modeling to optimize websites, improving search ranking, increasing website traffic, conversions, sales leads and online sales.
